author: Athanase le Rhéteur, 1571-1663
title: D. Athanasii rhetoris, presbyteri Byzantini, antipatellarus, epistola de unione ecclesiarum ad Alexandrinum et Hierosolymorum patriarchas. Anticampanella in compendium redactus. (Parthenii, patriarchae Constantinopolitani Decretum synodale damnans Calvini
